btl_tutorial_09_encount_btl.title: Street Battles
btl_tutorial_09_encount_btl.explanation:
Ruthless thugs wander the streets looking to pick fights with
anyone who even looks at them the wrong way.

You can choose to run away from these thugs, but you'll earn
money and EXP if you teach them a lesson instead.

btl_tutorial_10_throw.title: Grab, then throw!
btl_tutorial_10_throw.explanation:
When an enemy is guarding, you can grab them out of it with <Sign:0,Combat>.
Follow-up attack with <Sign:2,Combat> or <Sign:1,Combat>, or press <Sign:0,Combat> again to throw them.

Throwing enemies is a great tactic when you're surrounded. 

<Sign:0,Combat><Sign:2,Combat>/<Sign:0,Combat><Sign:1,Combat>/<Sign:0,Combat><Sign:0,Combat>

btl_tutorial_12_defend_weapon.title: Stash it for later!
btl_tutorial_12_defend_weapon.explanation:
Weapons with a <symbol=can_pocket_in> over them (as opposed to the normal <symbol=black_down_triangle,Combat>) can be
stored after you grab them.

Grab a weapon with <Sign:0,Combat>, then store it with <symbol=button_down,Combat>. You'll lose the
weapon (just like other grabbable objects) if you don't store it
before the battle ends.

btl_tutorial_01_quick_attack.title: Try out your basic Rush Combo!
btl_tutorial_01_quick_attack.explanation:
Press <Sign:2,Combat> to perform a quick attack. If you want to keep up the pressure,
chain quick attacks together into a Rush Combo by pressing <Sign:2,Combat> up to four times.
Getting in some swift jabs can open up your opponent to other attacks.

<Sign:2,Combat> / <Sign:2,Combat><Sign:2,Combat> / <Sign:2,Combat><Sign:2,Combat><Sign:2,Combat> / <Sign:2,Combat><Sign:2,Combat><Sign:2,Combat><Sign:2,Combat>

btl_tutorial_02_strong_attack.title: Spice it up with a Finishing Blow!
btl_tutorial_02_strong_attack.explanation:
During a Rush Combo, pressing <Sign:1,Combat> will unleash a powerful attack called a
Finishing Blow. Not only does a Finishing Blow cause some serious damage, but
it can also stun whoever winds up on the receiving end.

<Sign:2,Combat><Sign:1,Combat> / <Sign:2,Combat><Sign:2,Combat><Sign:1,Combat> / <Sign:2,Combat><Sign:2,Combat><Sign:2,Combat><Sign:1,Combat> / <Sign:2,Combat><Sign:2,Combat><Sign:2,Combat><Sign:2,Combat><Sign:1,Combat>

btl_tutorial_03_down_attack.title: Get fancy with a Double Finisher!
btl_tutorial_03_down_attack.explanation:
You can follow up a Finishing Blow by pressing <Sign:1,Combat> again to unleash a
Double Finisher. While it leaves you wide open, landing a Double Finisher
deals massive damage and blows your enemies away.

<Sign:2,Combat><Sign:1,Combat><Sign:1,Combat> / <Sign:2,Combat><Sign:2,Combat><Sign:1,Combat><Sign:1,Combat> / <Sign:2,Combat><Sign:2,Combat><Sign:2,Combat><Sign:1,Combat><Sign:1,Combat> / <Sign:2,Combat><Sign:2,Combat><Sign:2,Combat><Sign:2,Combat><Sign:1,Combat><Sign:1,Combat>

btl_tutorial_04_guard.title: Hold the button to block!
btl_tutorial_04_guard.explanation:
With people taking swings at you left and right, you need to know how
to defend yourself. Hold <Sign:6,Combat> to put your guard up and block incoming attacks.

Watch for openings in an enemy's attacks and strike!

btl_tutorial_05_sway.title: You can also evade!
btl_tutorial_05_sway.explanation:
Sometimes, dodging can be more effective than guarding.
Press <Sign:3,Combat> to evade in the direction you're moving in.

Dodging is more difficult than guarding, but it makes it easier
to find openings in the enemy's attacks.

btl_tutorial_06_lock_on.title: Focus on a single target!
btl_tutorial_06_lock_on.explanation:
If you want to keep your eyes on your opponent, hold <Sign:4,Combat> to lock on
to them.

Kiryu will always face the enemy regardless of how you move around.
Staying focused on the fight is important on both offense and defense.
btl_tutorial_06_lock_on.command: Lock on with <symbol=button_r1,Combat> and move with <symbol=button_l_stick,Combat>

btl_tutorial_07_charge_attack.title: Charge up your power!
btl_tutorial_07_charge_attack.explanation:
Hold and release <Sign:2,Combat> to unleash a powerful Charge Attack that can
stun unsuspecting enemies.

This is especially effective against enemies who tend to guard,
so be sure to watch your opponent's patterns before committing
to a Charge Attack.
btl_tutorial_07_charge_attack.command: Hold to charge, then release <symbol=button_shikaku,Combat> to strike.

btl_tutorial_08_hact.title: Feel the Heat!
btl_tutorial_08_hact.explanation:
Attacking enemies will pump Kiryu up and fill the Heat Gauge.
Press <Sign:1,Combat> when the Heat Icon appears in the middle of the screen
to expend a segment of your Heat Gauge and use a Heat Action.
There are many different Heat Actions depending on the situation,
so be ready to press <Sign:1,Combat> whenever you see the Heat Icon!
btl_tutorial_08_hact.command: Press <symbol=button_sankaku,Combat> when you see the flaming Heat Icon!

btl_tutorial_11_weapon_use.title: All's fair in a street fight!
btl_tutorial_11_weapon_use.explanation:
Objects with <symbol=black_down_triangle,Combat> displayed above them can be grabbed with <Sign:0,Combat> and used
as a weapon.

If you find yourself in a pinch, check your surroundings for a
weapon and turn the tables on your opponents!

btl_tutorial_13_weapon_set.title: Equip your weapon!
btl_tutorial_13_weapon_set.explanation:
Select the equip slot from the left side of the screen, then
choose a weapon you wish to equip from the inventory on the right
side of the screen.

You can change these at any time from the Pause Menu.

btl_tutorial_14__weapon_change.title: Using Equipped Weapons
btl_tutorial_14__weapon_change.explanation:
Press <symbol=button_left,Combat>, <symbol=button_up,Combat>, or <symbol=button_right,Combat> to take out a weapon you've equipped. Find the
right weapon for a given situation and demolish your foes!

btl_tutorial_15__weapon_equip.title: Using Equipment
btl_tutorial_15__weapon_equip.explanation:
Select the equip slot from the left side of the screen, then
choose something you want to equip from the inventory on the
right side of the screen.

Equipping armor can raise your defense, and in some special
cases, activate special effects.

You can also get Equipment Bonuses if you equip certain
special combinations of items.

get_ability_1.title: Abilities
get_ability_1.explanation:
You can spend EXP to boost Kiryu's base stats, such as Health and
Attack, or learn Battle Skills to grant you new actions.

There are some skills that you cannot access at the moment. You
must meet certain requirements to unlock these skills.

For the time being, try learning <color=red>Strong Charge Attack</color> from the
Battle Skills page.

btl_tutorial_16.title: Get Super Charged!
btl_tutorial_16.explanation:
Some enemies <color=red>cannot be knocked down with regular attacks</color>. If you
come across such an enemy, hold and release <Sign:1,Combat> to unleash a strong
Charge Attack and take them down a notch!

exbtl_tutorial_01.title: Extreme Heat Mode
exbtl_tutorial_01.explanation:
When your Heat Gauge is full, press <Sign:5,Combat> to enter a special mode
called Extreme Heat Mode. Your Heat Gauge will drain constantly
while in this mode, but you will gain access to some weapons and
special attacks not available in Kiryu's regular style.

exbtl_tutorial_02.title: Komaki Fist Reversal
exbtl_tutorial_02.explanation:
Press <Sign:1,Combat> when an enemy is about to hit you to execute the Komaki
Fist Reversal.

This is a powerful counterattack that changes depending on the
direction the enemy is attacking you from. Use it wisely!
exbtl_tutorial_02.command: <symbol=button_sankaku,Combat> when about to be hit by an enemy

exbtl_tutorial_03.title: Komaki Firearm Flip
exbtl_tutorial_03.explanation:
Press <Sign:1,Combat> when near an enemy with a gun to execute the Komaki Firearm
Flip.

This is a strong counterattack that will force the enemy to drop
their weapon and give you the upper hand.
exbtl_tutorial_03.command: <symbol=button_r1,Combat> to enter fighting stance, then <symbol=button_sankaku,Combat> near enemy with gun

btl_tutorial_17.title: Essence of Finishing Blow
btl_tutorial_17.explanation:
Some story battles let you kick your opponent's ass in style.

First get your opponent's health low, then wait for the prompt
to rapidly press <Sign:2,Combat> to build up Heat.
Once your Heat is fully charged, press <Sign:1,Combat> to activate Essence of
Finishing Blow!
btl_tutorial_17.command: <symbol=button_shikaku,Combat> rapidly to build up Heat, then <symbol=button_sankaku,Combat>

encount_boss_info.title: Street Bosses
encount_boss_info.explanation:
After you win a certain number of street battles, a powerful
street boss may appear somewhere in the city.

Be sure to prepare well before taking them on!
